description: Offers biblical insight and practical wisdom into two crucial areas of family communication and conflict resolution. Mack alerts us to pitfalls of faulty communication, such as "undertalk" and "overtalk," poor listening, forms of falsehood, and "circuit jammers" to communication. He examines why families fight and explains the key to turning family discord into harmony providing practical guidance for the Christian family.
author: Wayne A. Mack
